# Alarm.Schedule

**Enumeration**

A list of all types of schedules that the framework supports.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Schedule
```

## Setting an alarm schedule

- **Alarm.Schedule.Relative**: An object that describes when an alarm alerts, relative to the device’s timezone.
- **Alarm.Schedule.fixed(_:)**: A one-shot alarm that fires at a specific time, not a time relative to the current time zone.
- **Alarm.Schedule.relative(_:)**: An alarm that can repeat and fire at a time relative to the device’s current time zone.

## Setting an alarm schedule

- **schedule**: The schedule determines when the alarm alerts.

## Conforms To

- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
